verses.name: 2 Samuel 8:14
verses.text: And he put garrisons in Edom; throughout all Edom put he garrisons, and all they of Edom became David’s servants. And the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 8:15
verses.text: And David reigned over all Israel; and David executed judgment and justice unto all his people.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 8:16
verses.text: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 8:17
verses.text: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Seraiah was the scribe;
